name: Community Care Concepts of Woolwich, Wellesley and Wilmot Townships - Home at Last
category: Transportation for Seniors and People with Disabilities
comment:
Service for older adults being discharged from hospital

Transportation home from hospital * personal support worker assist in settling, may include cooking, prescription pick-up, groceries, company * care coordinator follow-up the day after discharge to coordinate community services
